item.title: About me, about this
item.description: Hello World! Welcome to my blog! My name is Aqil, and I’m a software engineer here in Toronto, Canada. I also do some data science consulting in my spare time, so if you’re ever interested, reach out. The purpose of this blog is to capture what I have learned and share these learnings. I’ll cover some helpful tips and tricks as I find them, engineering leadership things, and capture how I view certain parts of the software world.
